name: Oculus Ring
flavorText: The eye of the one god blesses those who seek it out.
flavorTextHtml: The eye of the one god blesses those who seek it out.

secondary.textHtml: Chance to create an area of focused power on killing a monster. Damage is increased by 82% while standing in the area. [70 - 85]%
secondary.text: Chance to create an area of focused power on killing a monster. Damage is increased by 82% while standing in the area. [70 - 85]%
